data.text:
An amazing all inclusive experience! The room was comfortable and enough for what was needed (only let down was the view from the balcony was a wall but as we weren’t staying in the room all day we weren’t too fussed).
The food was great with so many options and I was never left hungry! The bar was good with lots of cocktail options ! 3 pools with plenty of space , a fun games room and all staff were helpful and friendly ! Definitely worth the money for the experience! We recommend hiring a car to explore the island. We did this online before we went but the hotel also offered this service.
Great location with a 10/15 minute walk from the medieval city !
data.title: All Inclusive Holiday

data.text:
We are finishing our week at the Mitsis Grand Hotel and this place is absolutely fantastic. Facilities are wonderful, from restaurants to bars to pools to gym… unbelievable value for money on an all-inclusive stay. I could imagine neither faulting nor improving any aspect ! But great as it is, the staff here are even BETTER. So helpful and friendly, way beyond the call of duty. Every single individual has been great, really lovely: elegant, charming as well as top-notch professional staff throughout the hotel. A particular shout-out must go to Franzeska and Kattholiki at Reception !
This place is so brilliant we tried to book immediately for next year, only to learn it is due for a refurbishment ! I honestly cannot imagine what needs refurbishing here ! But we will certainly be checking in order to return following completion of the refurb because we want to come back and want to know how they improved it ! The mind boggles.
data.title: Five star hotel with six star staff

Only a day into the holiday but it is a wow so far. The friendliness, service and ambiance are second to none. The food is wonderful and we have only ventured to either the main buffet restaurant and the burger bar so far, cant wait to try the a la carte! 
Sun-beds are plentiful and despite the pool being a little cool at present we have ventured for a swim. 
So far we can recommend this hotel fully, our room is on the 4th floor and over looks the pool, if you do book you are in for a pleasant stay.

data.text:
Just spent a week at the wonderful Hotel Grand.
Amazing hotel, great location. Great pools. Mini bars in rooms restocked every other day.
Large tidy rooms with lots of space.

These guys could not do enough for our dietary requirements!
As soon as we arrived a meeting with the chefs was arranged. There were several eating places within the hotel and so we were able to eat at these also.
Every breakfast lunch and dinner the lovely restaurant team (Popi and all the Nikos’ 🙏) would go and get a chef who would then advise what we could eat and then would prepare it from the kitchen to avoid cross contamination.
Both myself and daughter are extremely sensitive coeliacs-am happy to report we had no gluttening issues at all!! And we ate ALOT!!!

So if you’re looking for an amazing hotel, with wonderful staff who will literally do everything in their power to ensure you have a great holiday then this is definitely the place to check out!! 🙂
data.title: Great Hotel stay! Perfect for Gluten Free!
